name: iPrep Coach
description: iPrep Coach is a unique app designed for Tutors & Teachers to grow as Smart & Personalised educators.   Add Digital Practice to your Teaching with iPrep Practice App  Using the iPrep Coach App, you can create classes and then invite students/parents to download the iPrep Practice App and linking to your class.  By clicking on Invite Students, you can share your class code with the students/parents mobile numbers. When they will click on the link, the iPrep Practice App will be downloaded on their phone and they will also be automatically connected to your class.   You shall then be able to see their live mastery & scores, assign topics and tests to them anytime, get their reports and also chat with one or many students.  5 mins a day of enjoyable practice can do wonders for your students.   Use iPrep Digital Class to show animated video lessons  the second benefit of iPrep is the real life connected and interactive animated video content for Math and Science for Classes 1st to 12th.   You can use the animated lessons on a TV, projector, laptop, computer or even a mobile phone to bring visual clarity to any topic.  Both the iPrep Coach and iPrep Digital Class content help you to integrate digital into your best of teaching/coaching and groom your students as growth oriented achievers.   Happy Teaching!
